title: gurOttamA nannu
sahitya:
gurOttamA nannu brOvu raghUttamA ati karuNatO parama guNOttamA


anupallavi

  virOdhamA nApai bahu virOdhamA nApai bahuvarudhamani vacci kAvumu


caraNam    dharalO svarNa vADilO bhUvara subbAryagam gammaku
vara putruDu gAjaninci shrI raguvarya muniki vArasina sundara
